X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Updated blobs from LA.UM.9.6.2.r1-04100-89xx.0
- Updated drm widevine to 1.3

alioth.changelog:
- sepolicy: Address more denials
- Update qdcm to MIUI 21.8.4 Weekly
- Update Camera, Fingerprint, SDM, Perf, Sensors blobs to MIUI 21.8.4 Weekly 
- Build kernel with AOSP Clang 12.0.7
- parts: Add dynamic thermal profile implementation
- parts: Implement Clear Speaker
- overlay: Enable burn-in protection for status/navbar
- cutout: show a ring on the camera cutout when its in use
- props: Set shutdown timeout
- Cleanup props
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

- New kernel:
* Rebase and cleanup.
* Base on last SMxx50.0 CAF tag and android-4.19-stable
* Merged jaegeuk/f2fs-stable
* Imported exfat driver

Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-11-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-11-0-official-weekly.4279481/post-85045261

apollo.changelog:
- add thermal profiles per apps (under battery settings)
- add back saturated colour profile for display
- bump gcam mic volume to match redfin (can hear things in videos now)
- general fixups

beryllium.changelog:
- sdm845-common:
Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- beryllium: Update blobs from V12.0.3.0.QEJMIXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0
- Kernel: arch/arm64: dts: disable dfps in jdi fhd panel and ebbg ft8716 panel
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cheeseburger.changelog:
- Fixed Smart Charging sepolicy and permissions
- Sepolicy: Address more denials
- Doze: Improve support for AOD
- fstab: Disable force encryption for f2fs
- Update Media blobs from LA.UM.9.2.r1-01800-SDMxx0.0
- Update WFD blobs from phoenix_sprout 11 RKQ1.201123.002
- Fixes for WFD (maybe will work)
- Inlined Camera DotFix (v6.0)
- Fixes sepolicy and permissions for vibration strength into OnePlus settings
- Drop all SF offset related props
- Disable surfaceflinger backpressure
- pocketmode: Rework
- Add dummy libqti-perfd-client
- Kernel: Enable support NTFS
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
10/07/2021
- Fixed the fingerprint dialog
- Disabled the SIM is HD capable notification
- Enabled ambient display settings

20/06/2021
- Rebased the device sources
- Switched to the Qualcomm Power HAL
- Switched to a different screen off fod implementation

22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance

surya.changelog:
- Added MIUI offline charging daemon (Fixed offline charger)
- Fixed offline charging LED indicator 
- Tweak perf config
- Tune CPUfreqs
- overlay: Cleanup
- Remove wide color display props
- Cleanup color profiles (display does not support WCD)
- overlay: Limit screen recorder to 90fps
- Update unpin blobs from MIUI V12.5.1.0.RJGMIXM
- Update pin blobs from LA.UM.9.1.r1-10600-SMxxx0.0
- gps hal: Update to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10600-SMxxx0.0
- nfc configs: Sync configs with V12.5.1.0.RJGMIXM
- audio configs: Cleanup and sync with V12.5.1.0.RJGMIXM
- Fixed USB tethering
- Add missed props
- Remove nv_mac service
- Kang SF phase offsets from coral and cmi
- sepolicy: Correct wakeup lables
- sepolicy: label spidev0.1
- sepolicy: Address more denials
- Remove XiaomiDoze package and move its functions to XiaomiParts
- Build kernel with AOSP Clang 12.0.7
- overlay: disable LED multiple colors
- parts: Update RU and UA translations
- overlay: Define OEM fast charge sysfs node
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Required to be on android 11 f/w.
- A clean flash is mandatory while switching from pre OSS builds. Please backup your data beforehand!

sweet.changelog:
For installation information, refer to https://telegra.ph/Installation-of-ArrowOS-sweetsweetin---included-vendor-05-10

15/08/2021
• Removed more unused files and services in the vendor
• Solved batterysecret denials (fast charging should work better now)
• Dropped QTI perfd (improved device temperatures)
• Enabled burn-in protection on the navigation bar and status bar
• Added russian translations to the device specific settings

10/08/2021
• Improved cutout ring rotation changes handling
• Fixed cutout aliasing (by showing the cutout ring always, but smaller when camera is not in use)
• Switched to Pixel offline charging animation
• Increased status bar height (now icons are vertically aligned with the cutout)
• Moved the device specific settings to system settings category
• Removed more unused files in the vendor
• Fixed KCAL out of the box (once again (might need a clean flash))
• Merged the tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10900-SMxxx0.0 into the kernel
• Updated blobs from MIUI V12.5.6.0 RKFMIXM

06/08/2021
• Switched to AOSP refresh rate settings
• Enabled content-based automatic refresh rate switching (configurable)
• Fixed Dirac disabling itself randomly

27/07/2021
• Added a ring to the cutout camera for fixing the halo effect on low conditions (only shown when the front camera is in use)

24/07/2021
• Reduced saturation level
• Added Dirac sound enhancer
• Fixed bad colors until turning the screen off and on

umi.changelog:

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay

violet.changelog:
- Updated blobs to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Removed Violet parts and added Mi sound Enhancer to Settings>sounds and fps meter can be accessed through QS tiles
- Removed Smart Charging
- Enabled 24bit Playback as default
- Fixes weird touch/scroll issues on fp touch event
- Added Color modes 
- Enabled iorap
- Rebased and updated kernel to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Upstreamed media HAL to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Added LSE Atomic Optimization
- Added Dev frequency boost
- Backported LZ4 from mainline
